generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings, extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: There is a sidewalk visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to the bus, and also on the left side, bordered by bushes and a curb.
- building: Several multi-story buildings are visible in the background and along the sides of the road, including commercial buildings with signs.
- vegetation: Trees and hedges are clearly visible along the sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and soil are visible in the foreground and along the edges of the sidewalk and road.
- sky: The sky is visible through the gaps in the tree canopy in the upper part of the image.
- person: Several people can be seen walking on the sidewalk and near the bus on the right side of the road.
- car: A car is visible parked on the right side of the road, behind the bus.
- bus: A large, beige bus is prominently visible on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign indicating "Bereich Jungfernstieg" with a parking symbol is visible on the left side of the road.
- pole: A pole supporting the traffic sign is visible on the left side of the road.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, mounted on a pole, near the intersection ahead.
